The &appName; project is a library (collection) of classes written in the Java programming language, that are intended to be used for research in computational biology. The compiled library and the body of source code for these Java classes are available for download within a self-extracting installer (see the "Download &appName;" link above), subject to the terms of the software license agreement. The license agreement is the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL), which is a standard "free software" and "open source" license. &appName; requires the Java 2 Runtime Environment (JRE) version 1.4 or newer, or an equivalent JRE. For more information about the &appName; library, please consult the &appName; User Manual.
